attributes.additional_details:
To be able to migrate to the U.K, an interview, or an online acceptance form, must be established before they can enter the country.

The interview will be based on:
-How they will benefit the economy
-Criminal record
-Previous Job's
-Qualifications and grades
-How long they intend to stay (If they do not leave on the day they specified, they are fined, then deported.)

- Are they a tourist? (They must specify how long they are going to stay. If they do not leave on the day, they are fined, then deported.)

Not anyone can come into the U.K, they must be an asset to the economy e.g
-If the person that wishes to gain entry has no qualifications, then they are denied access.

-If they have good qualifications and no criminal record they they are more than welcome.
